text: avan (allahu) parayum: jinnukalil ninnum manusyaril ninnumayi ninnalkku mump kalinnupeayittulla samuhannalute kuttattil narakattil pravesiccukealluka. orea samuhavum (atil) pravesikkumpealeakke atinre saheadara samuhatte sapikkum. annane avarellavarum avite orumiccukutikkalinnal avarile pingamikal avarute mungamikalepparri parayum: nannalute raksitave, ivaran nannale valiterriccatâ€Œ. at keant avarkk ni narakattil ninn iratti siksa keatukkename. avan parayum: ellavarkkum irattiyuntâ€Œ. pakse ninnal manas'silakkunnilla
